multiplechoiceresponse.p: Where do message IDs in a Redis stream come from?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Pick one answer

choicegroup.choice: Either the Redis server or the producer, depending on the options used when producing the message

div.p: Redis streams can automatically generate message IDs for you, using a <timestamp>-<sequence> format. You may also specify your own ID for each message, for example when you are ingesting data from another system into Redis, and that data already has unique IDs.
